content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: This is one of those simple clash of code that can be solved in 30 seconds and it's not super original, but the statement is not bad and the tests work. Approved!

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Interesting and deceptively complex puzzle. Exactly what we want in clashes.

I like it,

I got just a bit confused by the statement: " [ may create new recursion depth if..."  and the fact that you should create a new recursion depth in all cases in the resolution.

The last paragraph make it extra clear but I wonder if it is not more simple to just say right away 

- [ create a new recursion depth.
- ] close the recursion depth created by the corresponding [.

Even if it is not totally accurate in the Brainfuck language.
Indeed, not the best contribution I've made to CodinGame. Tried to make it clearer, how about now?
